CustomProperties.Name: FontColorDone
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of done step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColorCurrent
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of current step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColorToDo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of to do step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorDone
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of done step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorCurrent
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of current step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorToDo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of to do step text.

CustomProperties.Name: 1stStepText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows to edit the text name of 1st step

CustomProperties.Name: 2ndStepText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows to edit the text name of 2nd step

CustomProperties.Name: 3rdStepText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows to edit the text name of 3rd step

CustomProperties.Name: 4thStepText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows to edit the text name of 4th step

CustomProperties.Name: 5thStepText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows to edit the text name of 5th step

CustomProperties.Name: StepCount
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Reduces/adds steps. Insert a number from 3 to 5.

Rules.InvariantScript: If(!cntFourthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/3, !cntThirdPage.Visible, Parent.Width/2,!cntSecondPage.Visible, Parent.Width, !cntFifthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/4, Parent.Width/5)
If(!cntFourthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/3, !cntThirdPage.Visible, Parent.Width/2,!cntSecondPage.Visible, Parent.Width, !cntFifthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/4, Parent.Width/5)

If(
    App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
    Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
        Breadcrumb.FillColorDone
))

If(
    btnStep2.Fill = Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    Breadcrumb.FontColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
        Breadcrumb.FontColorDone
))
If(!cntFourthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/3, !cntThirdPage.Visible, Parent.Width/2,!cntSecondPage.Visible, Parent.Width, !cntFifthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/4, Parent.Width/5)

If(
    App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo3rdScreen,
    Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
        If(
            App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
            Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
            Breadcrumb.FillColorDone
        )
    )
)

If(
    btnStep3.Fill = Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    Breadcrumb.FontColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
        If(
            App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
            Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
            Breadcrumb.FontColorDone
        )
    )
)
If(!cntFourthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/3, !cntThirdPage.Visible, Parent.Width/2,!cntSecondPage.Visible, Parent.Width, !cntFifthPage.Visible, Parent.Width/4, Parent.Width/5)
If(Breadcrumb.StepCount = 3, false, true) && If(!cntThirdPage.Visible, false, true) && If(!cntSecondPage.Visible, false, true)

If(
    App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo4thScreen,
    Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo3rdScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
        If(
            App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
            Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
            If(
                App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
                Breadcrumb.FillColorToDo,
                Breadcrumb.FillColorDone
            )
        )
    )
)

If(
    btnStep4.Fill = Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    Breadcrumb.FontColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
        If(
            App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
            Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
            If(
                App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo3rdScreen,
                Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
                Breadcrumb.FontColorDone
            )
        )
    )
)

If(Breadcrumb.StepCount = 4, false, true) &&
If(!cntFourthPage.Visible, false, true) && If(!cntThirdPage.Visible, false, true) && If(!cntSecondPage.Visible, false, true)

If(
    btnStep5.Fill = Breadcrumb.FillColorCurrent,
    Breadcrumb.FontColorCurrent,
    If(
        App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo1stScreen,
        Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
        If(
            App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo2ndScreen,
            Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
            If(
                App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo3rdScreen,
                Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
                If(
                    App.ActiveScreen = Breadcrumb.NavigationTo4thScreen,
                    Breadcrumb.FontColorToDo,
                    Breadcrumb.FontColorDone
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
